name: Vanshika Singh
content: Myself Vanshika Singh from Electronics Engineering placed in Microsoft, For me, KY is really a big celebration. It hypes up not just me but a large numbet of people in the college and even the city. It is something that clearly disproves the fact that IITians are only Nerds.

name: Harshit Bhati
content: Myself Harshit Bhati, I'm from Rajasthan, currently I'm pursuing Btech in chemical engineering.I got placed in Larsen & toubro infotech as a business consultant. I am part of KY since my first year, for me KY is not a fest but a feeling, for me KY is all about great people, great energy, memorable experiences.
